name: EggHop
description:
EggHop is a thrilling adventure game where you follow a curious goose on its travels around the world. Explore new places, solve puzzles, and collect rewards as you help the goose on its quest for discovery. With simple controls, gorgeous graphics, and a charming storyline, EggHop promises hours of fun for players of all ages. Don't miss out on this egg-citing journey! Start playing today.

Online Supported
You can now play with your friends with no problems and visit their worlds.

Many Features
In EggHop You can now Build, Break and Create Tons of Worlds.
Each World Has its Own Unique Adventure So Get on With your Friend and Start Discovering Worlds With EggHops Custom Unique Economy.

Eggs: Use eggs to either gain height or hold down buttons.

Puzzles Galore: There is a plethora of levels to complete, each with several puzzles inside, varying in difficulty.

Infinite Mode: If you run out of fun in the campaign there is an infinite mode where you can test your speed to get a high score.

Use Egg Locks to Lock out Your World!!!
And Build Your Own World With Various Types of Blocks Harvested By Trees.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows
    • Processor: 2 Ghz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 256 mb
    • Storage: 200 MB available space
